snippet: Mr. Trump’s victory gave the irrepressible celebrity candidate the status his opponents long feared, as a bona fide leader in the race.
abstract: Donald J Trump's victory in New Hampshire primary confirms his position as leading Republican candidate, to dismay of opponents and political establishment, and sends him into remaining primaries in position of strength; Trump's win is driven by supporters who chose him early on and never wavered from that decision.

byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan contributed reporting from Londonderry, N.H.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s victory gave the irrepressible celebrity candidate the status his opponents long feared, as a bona fide leader in the race.

headline.main: Backers Stayed With Donald Trump as He Regained His Bearings
headline.print_headline: Backers Stayed With Trump as He Regained His Bearings
